title: What are the affordable, clean hotels in San Francisco with breakfast included
excerpt: Navigating the vibrant city of San Francisco while sticking to a budget can be a daunting task, especially when it comes to finding affordable hotels that also offer cleanliness and complimentary breakfast. This list is valuable as it highlights reliable options that not only save you money but also provide a comfortable stay, allowing you to focus on exploring the city's iconic sights. With these recommendations, you can enjoy a hassle-free trip without compromising on quality or your morning meal.
intro: Discover the best affordable and clean hotels in San Francisco that include breakfast, ensuring a delightful start to your day in this iconic city.

hotels.name: Bay Hotel
hotels.description: Bay Hotel is ideally situated in San Francisco's vibrant Tenderloin district, just a short walk from key attractions like Union Square and Moscone Center. Guests can unwind in comfortable, well-furnished rooms featuring flat-screen TVs and cozy bedding, making it a perfect retreat after a day of sightseeing. With nearby landmarks such as Ghirardelli Square and Oracle Park, plus convenient access to San Francisco International Airport, Bay Hotel is the perfect base for your city adventures.
hotels.highlight: Offers complimentary breakfast, comfortable rooms with flat-screen TVs, and convenient access to key San Francisco attractions.

hotels.description: Discover comfort and convenience at Hotel Garrett, nestled in the lively center of San Francisco. Guests can unwind by the outdoor pool or stay active in the modern fitness center, while the thoughtfully designed rooms feature plush pillowtop beds and advanced entertainment options. Begin each day with a complimentary continental breakfast, setting the perfect tone for your city explorations. Book your stay at Hotel Garrett for an unforgettable experience.

Book your getaway today!

hotels.description: Discover the enchanting Fitzgerald Hotel Union Square, where Victorian charm meets modern amenities in the heart of San Francisco's Theatre District. Ideally located near Union Square, explore iconic attractions like Chinatown and the Ferry Building, making it the perfect base for your city adventure.
